title: Designing Inclusive Higher Education Through Open and Distance Learning (ODL)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and higher education experience
context.additional_context: Establishing ODL systems to address social diversity and educational inequality

learning_goals: Learners can explain the theoretical foundations and social contribution of the ODL (Open and Distance Learning) model
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans using a mobile microlearning platform
Learners can complete project-based assessment tasks using digital collaboration tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
